who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.p1: ZOB TRADE LLC is an integrated petroleum supplier registered in Georgia and operating with its own production and logistics infrastructure.
who_we_are.p2: With 25 years of operational experience, the company is directly involved in the physical movement of petroleum products — from refining and storage to export delivery.
who_we_are.p3: ZOB TRADE LLC is not an intermediary. We are a physical participant in the supply chain.
